Html:
Hi,

I have developed an application in VS 2008 which uses this dll. The application runs fine and scheudles job programmatically on win 7. But when I deploy same application on Win server 2008, the task is not scheudled. neither an exception is thrown. Please help me.

Regards,

Suchi
